title: UniDeck Beta
author: Erfan Besharat
excerpt: UniDeck makes it easy to create personalized dashboards and portals for both individuals and enterprises. Connect your favorite tools like Jira, Google, Microsoft Teams, Trello, and GitHub, while AI helps you design and automate effortlessly.
text: UniDeck makes it easy to create personalized dashboards and portals for both individuals and enterprises. Connect your favorite tools like Jira, Google, Microsoft Teams, Trello, and GitHub, while AI helps you design and automate effortlessly.
html: UniDeck makes it easy to create personalized dashboards and portals for both individuals and enterprises. Connect your favorite tools like Jira, Google, Microsoft Teams, Trello, and GitHub, while AI helps you design and automate effortlessly.
